Docs.summary: The class represents a forward item response object that is used to forward meeting messages to another recipient.

remarks.para: The ReferenceItemId property must be set on the object to identify the meeting message that is forwarded. ToRecipients, CcRecipients, or BccRecipients must be set to the recipients of the forwarded meeting message. One recipient must be set if the message is sent. You do not have to set a recipient if the message disposition is to save.
